headline: 1 Potential Stock-Split AI Stock Up 1,780% in 20 Years to Buy in 2025, According to Wall Street
summary: Smart investors like stock splits not only because they reduce a company's share price but also because they tend to spotlight stocks worth owning.  Shares of Axon Enterprise (NASDAQ: AXON) have surged 1,780% in the last two decades, which equates to 15.8% annually.  Among the 15 analysts who follow Axon, 100% have a buy rating on the stock.
